snippet: Sunderland are finding it difficult to compete financially with their Premier League rivals in the transfer window, manager David Moyes has said, as he aims to bolster his fragile squad in search of their first Premier League win....

headline.main: Sunderland Struggling to Match Rivals Financially-Moyes
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Struggling to Match Rivals Financially-Moyes

lead_paragraph: Sunderland are finding it difficult to compete financially with their Premier League rivals in the transfer window, manager David Moyes has said, as he aims to bolster his fragile squad in search of their first Premier League win.

snippet: Manchester City and Chelsea have been charged with failing to control their players during Saturday's Premier League match, the FA said on Monday....

headline.main: Man City, Chelsea Charged With Failing to Control Players
headline.print_headline: Man City, Chelsea Charged With Failing to Control Players

lead_paragraph: Manchester City and Chelsea have been charged with failing to control their players during Saturday's Premier League match, the FA said on Monday.

snippet: Manager Ronald Koeman is eager to lead Everton back into Europe after recent seasons have seen the Merseyside club languish among the mid-table positions in the Premier League....

headline.main: Koeman Keen to Lead Everton Back Into European Fold
headline.print_headline: Koeman Keen to Lead Everton Back Into European Fold

lead_paragraph: Manager Ronald Koeman is eager to lead Everton back into Europe after recent seasons have seen the Merseyside club languish among the mid-table positions in the Premier League.

snippet: New Aston Villa manager Roberto Di Matteo has warned his players to abide by team rules in the Championship as they prepare to make a quick return to the Premier League following last season's relegation from the top flight....

headline.main: Villa Boss Di Matteo Warns Players to Obey Team Rules
headline.print_headline: Villa Boss Di Matteo Warns Players to Obey Team Rules

lead_paragraph: New Aston Villa manager Roberto Di Matteo has warned his players to abide by team rules in the Championship as they prepare to make a quick return to the Premier League following last season's relegation from the top flight.

snippet: Manager Roberto Martinez does not intend to rest Everton players for Wednesday's Merseyside derby against Liverpool in the Premier League even though it comes just three days before an FA Cup semi-final with Manchester United....

headline.main: No Plans to Rest Everton Players for Merseyside Derby-Martinez
headline.print_headline: No Plans to Rest Everton Players for Merseyside Derby-Martinez

lead_paragraph: Manager Roberto Martinez does not intend to rest Everton players for Wednesday's Merseyside derby against Liverpool in the Premier League even though it comes just three days before an FA Cup semi-final with Manchester United.

snippet: Long-term injury absentees Manuel Lanzini and Diafra Sakho are closing in on a return to action for West Ham United, the Premier League club said on Thursday....

headline.main: West Ham's Lanzini and Sakho Close to Return
headline.print_headline: West Ham's Lanzini and Sakho Close to Return

lead_paragraph: Long-term injury absentees Manuel Lanzini and Diafra Sakho are closing in on a return to action for West Ham United, the Premier League club said on Thursday.

snippet: Chelsea fans may have Ronaldinho and David Beckham to thank as they celebrate midfielder Willian slotting home free-kicks....

headline.main: Chelsea's Willian Studied Beckham, Ronaldinho Free-Kicks
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Willian Studied Beckham, Ronaldinho Free-Kicks

lead_paragraph: Chelsea fans may have Ronaldinho and David Beckham to thank as they celebrate midfielder Willian slotting home free-kicks.

snippet: Champions Leicester City will be without midfielder Danny Drinkwater for three games after he accepted a Football Association charge of violent misconduct, the club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Soccer-Leicester's Drinkwater Banned for Three Matches
headline.print_headline: Soccer-Leicester's Drinkwater Banned for Three Matches

lead_paragraph: Champions Leicester City will be without midfielder Danny Drinkwater for three games after he accepted a Football Association charge of violent misconduct, the club said on Thursday.

snippet: New Watford manager Walter Mazzarri has ordered players to stay at a hotel during pre-season in an effort to forge a closer bond, according to striker Jerome Sinclair....

headline.main: Watford Players Staying in Hotel During Pre-Season-Sinclair
headline.print_headline: Watford Players Staying in Hotel During Pre-Season-Sinclair

lead_paragraph: New Watford manager Walter Mazzarri has ordered players to stay at a hotel during pre-season in an effort to forge a closer bond, according to striker Jerome Sinclair.

snippet: Manchester City striker Wilfried Bony has dismissed British media reports linking him with a return to former club Swansea City during the January transfer window, by saying that he is happy at the Etihad Stadium....

headline.main: No Truth in Man City Exit Talks, Says Bony
headline.print_headline: No Truth in Man City Exit Talks, Says Bony

lead_paragraph: Manchester City striker Wilfried Bony has dismissed British media reports linking him with a return to former club Swansea City during the January transfer window, by saying that he is happy at the Etihad Stadium.
